TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMultiTargetingSupportService

summary.span: 为 Windows 工作流设计器主机提供多目标。

span.span: Provides multi-targeting for Windows Workflow Designer hosts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *多目标*功能是在 [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)]中查找与当前工作流项目的目标 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 版本相对应的已加载程序集的正确版本。*Multi-targeting* is the ability to find the right version of the loaded assembly that corresponds to the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version of the current workflow project in [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)]. 此接口由 [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] 设计器组件在内部实现和使用，可在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 宿主应用程序中以支持多目标的方式解析 [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)] 程序集。This interface is implemented and used internally by [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] designer components to resolve [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies in a multi-targeting aware fashion within the [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)] hosting application. 仅当需要将其他程序集动态加载到编辑 `AppDomain`时，[!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] 设计器组件才使用此接口的实现。The [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] designer components use the implementation of this interface only when additional assemblies need to be loaded dynamically into the editing `AppDomain`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Reflection.Assembly GetReflectionAssembly(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName targetAssemblyName) cil managed
Public Function GetReflectionAssembly (targetAssemblyName As AssemblyName) As Assembly

summary.span: 返回当前加载的具有给定程序集名称的程序集。

span.span: Returns the currently loaded assembly given the assembly name.

returns.span: 当前加载的具有给定程序集名称的程序集。

span.span: The currently loaded assembly given the assembly name.

span.span: The runtime type that corresponds to the specified type.
